sphinx.translation[0].definitions[0].def: an ancient Egyptian image of a lion with a human head, lying down
sphinx.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a large, very ancient sphinx which is close to the Pyramids of El Giza in Egypt and is visited by many tourists
sphinx.translation[1].definitions[1].def: in Greek mythology, a creature with the head of a woman and the body of a lion. She lay outside Thebes and killed people who could not answer her riddle (=very difficult question). Oedipus answered the riddle, and the Sphinx killed herself.
